reviewText: I Really Really like this collection!  The only reason it is 4-stars and not 5-stars is b/cuz there aren't any subtitles in English.  I have come to Really enjoy the Indian/Bollywood films and music.  But I would prefer to know what is being said in the songs.

This is a great DVD of some of the best performances set to Bollywood film. I have seen a lot of these movies and can say that for myself personally, this is a purchase that i am extremely happy with! Truly Bollywood Cinema Music at it's best!
